attributes.action: Don’t demolish the Ansar Youth Project building in two years
attributes.background: Ansar Youth Project is a youth club which aims to keep 11-19 year olds off the streets and out of trouble, they recently got their own building for the first time but it’s going to be demolished in 2 years and we want to save it so they can continue with the inspirational work they do.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
